title: Cast of new thriller turn out in Hollywood
text:
Cast of new thriller turn out in Hollywood 5:55am IST - 01:48 
The young cast of new horror film 'Truth or Dare' give a Hollywood launch to the film, which sees friends turn against each other when a game of Truth or Dare gets deadly. Rough Cut - no reporter narration. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The young cast of new horror film 'Truth or Dare' give a Hollywood launch to the film, which sees friends turn against each other when a game of Truth or Dare gets deadly.
